website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance Fresh Foam 818 v3 received mixed reviews from the consumers. On the positive side, it was praised for its style and versatility. However, the upper and tongue design did not sit well with some wearers.
pros: Many owners commended the New Balance Fresh Foam 818 v3 for the comfort it delivered
The style and available colorways pleased a good number of users
Multiple people noted that the trainer fit just right
Several reviewers lauded the footgear’s versatility
it was great for gym training and long walks
The lightweight nature of the shoe wowed some consumers
cons: The attached tongue on the New Balance Fresh Foam 818 v3 irked more than a few buyers because it made the product difficult to put on
A handful of wearers disliked the soft upper material because it was not durable and provided insufficient support during workouts

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Slippers With Laces
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying New Balance running and athletic shoes for many years. I am appalled by these lousy shoes, which the tags say were made in Vietnam. I have nothing against Vietnam, but these shoes are garbage. They don't have a tongue! They are slippers with laces. Who thought that was a good idea? The soles feel uneven and are very uncomfortable. Note to New Balance; I would gladly pat $120 or more for a good pair of shoes like you used to make in America than this crap you're pedaling for under $70.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Drischler

customer_reviews.title: If u want your feet to hurt.... go on and buy these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for work because they were on sale for a really good price. I now completely regret this decision. These shoes are so uncomfortable and are already starting to make my feet hurt after 1 week of use at work! WOULD NOT RECCOMEND TO ANYBODY.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: I saw it, I wanted it, I got it
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes. Super comfortable. I think this is an older model, so not easy to find. The seller was great and shipping was amazingly fast with DHL. Not only was it fast but DHL has a VERY detailed shipping progress on a package. Was a pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Get a half size larger.
customer_reviews.text: Weird shoes! It’s more like a really sturdy sock, super comfortable. I would suggest getting a half size bigger than you’re used to. It’s oddly built, the top half the shoe fits as expected, however the sole is “regular” sized.
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: All Good
customer_reviews.text: The heel has an interesting fit, but after a day, they feel good. These are wide, and have good support.
customer_reviews.author: Geos

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight comfort
customer_reviews.text: A surprisingly lightweight shoe and very breathable and comfortable. I wish it more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Arrik Magruder

customer_reviews.title: Very good all around gym shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great for short distance runs and WODS. I do a lot of compound movements during my workouts and found these shoes to be very comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfortable slipper shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good for very casual use. They slip on and off easily. Little traction in wet weather, especially in muddy areas. Pretty comfortable though. I got them for about $20. Would not pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Burke

customer_reviews.title: Dnt do it
customer_reviews.text: Looses shape and balance to quickly, doesnt breathe well and not supportive in any way
customer_reviews.author: McDmous

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good ankle support.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are comfortable and exactly what I expected. Happy with my purchase. Something to note is that they are well padded for heal support. Worth it for the money that I spent.
customer_reviews.author: Iain Campbell

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's 818v3 Fitness Shoes
product_meta.description: These men's 818v3 trainers from New Balance feature a fresh foam midsole to provide premium plushness underfoot. Power up with the 818v3 to Fire on all cylinders during every gym session. These men’s training shoes offer an updated fresh foam stable midsole and a synthetic midfoot for added support, while the bootie construction helps keep you looking and feeling good.
